title: Kylie Jenner has 'accepted' the stretch marks on her body as 'a little gift' from baby Stormi
text:
She largely kept her first pregnancy out of the public eye before giving birth to baby Stormi on Feb. 1, 2018.

And Kylie Jenner admitted to her Instagram fans that bouncing back to her famous figure wasn't too difficult.

The 22-year-old billionaire also accepted that her body had changed forever with stretch marks across her 'breasts, butt and thighs.'

Hard at work: Kylie Jenner admitted to her Instagram fans that bouncing back to her famous figure wasn't too difficult

Kylie was in the mood for a question and answer series with her 148million followers as she set up the 'ask me anything' feature on Friday night.

A fan asked if it was 'hard getting back in shape after your pregnancy,' which the cosmetics mogul reported minimal difficulties.

'I snapped back pretty fast but it was never the same and still isn't,' she wrote. 'Once I accepted the change my confidence came back. It just takes time.'

Human: The 22-year-old billionaire also accepted that her body had changed forever with stretch marks across her 'breasts, butt and thighs'

Another fan asked if the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star had any stretch marks from being pregnant and what she used for treatment.

'On my breasts, butt and thighs,' she wrote. 'I haven't gotten rid of them ... just accepted them as a little gift from Stormi.'

Sticking to the pregnancy theme, she told her followers that there was 'nothing more special than feeling your baby move and grow' while she was pregnant.

Sweet: Sticking to the pregnancy theme, she told her followers that there was 'nothing more special than feeling your baby move and grow' while she was pregnant

'On my breasts, butt and thighs,' she wrote. 'I haven't gotten rid of them ... just accepted them as a little gift from Stormi.'

Despite a recent break up with Stormi's dad, rapper Travis Scott, Kylie still has babies on the brain.

'I can't wait to have more babies, but not ready just yet,' she wrote.

Travis and Kylie began a romantic relationship in 2017 shortly after she ended things with Tyga.
description: The 22-year-old billionaire also accepted that her body had changed forever with stretch marks across her 'breasts, butt and thighs.'
